name: Beach Bikers - Free Retro 8-bit Pixel Motorcycle Games
name_original: Beach Bikers - Free Retro 8-bit Pixel Motorcycle Games
description:
Beach bikers are riding on the beach, enjoying the sun. Jump over the obstacles to help them through. Try to get as high of a score as possible and compete with others in Game Center. Share the score with your friends on Facebook and Twitter.

Game Features:

* 8-bit art style and retro look
* Play with just one tap
* Very fast and challenging game play
* Easy to play, but hard to master
* Game Center integrated for more fun
* FREE... everything is there at no price

This cute indie game is awesome!
